docs.snippet: The tech industry was in an uproar over President Trump’s immigration order, but Silicon Valley’s most noted Trump supporter was unfazed. He’s applied for New Zealand citizenship.

docs.snippet: Federal officials say they arrested Benjamin T. S. McDowell after he bought a gun from an undercover agent and said he wanted to commit an attack like Mr. Roof’s.
